I can help you with a plan to financial health. I can answer the following questions:

  • At my age, is it a good idea to buy my first house/condo?
  • Will I be able to afford a house in Los Angeles with prices as high as they are?
  • If I have debts, how should I plan to pay them off?
  • If I cannot buy a house alone, what are my alternatives?

Together, we can work to get you on the road to financial health. Contact me today for more information: 310-287-2095
